casebody.data:
Gregory Allen TAYLOR
v.
HARNETT COUNTY DISTRICT COURT, Jacqualyn L. Lee. No. 412P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Gregory Allen Taylor, for Taylor, Gregory Allen.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 9th of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Harnett County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
